verses.roman:
svarūpa-gosāñi yabe ei pada gāhilā
uṭhi' premāveśe prabhu nācite lāgilā

synonyms: svarūpa-gosāñi—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; yabe—when; ei—this; pada—verse; gāhilā—sang; uṭhi'-standing up; prema-āveśe—in ecstatic love of Kṛṣṇa; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nācite lāgilā—began to dance.
translation: When Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī sang this special song, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu immediately got up and began to dance in ecstatic love.
